channel.title: Lngnmn on Notes from the digital underground by Lngnmn

item.title: About me.
item.description: A few words about me I am Jack’s wasted life. I wrote a bunch of articles by an organ in the first person. https://schiptsov.github.io/ That scene from Rocky movie Arguably the best scene in the classic Rocky (1976) movie, is when Mickey comes with an offer: ..Well, what ya need is a manager. A manager, listen to me. I know, because I’ve been in this racket for fifty years…I’ve seen it all, all of it.
